Dashboard.headerDescription: Personal information that kept private and used only on your resume
Dashboard.get-started: Get started by creating a new.
Dashboard.no-project: There is no projects, Get started by creating a new project.
Dashboard.no-education: There is no education details, Get started by adding a education.
Dashboard.no-award: There is no awards, Get started by creating a new awards.
Dashboard.no-social: There is no social media, Get started by creating a new social media.
Dashboard.hasAlreadyAdded: This email has already been added.
Dashboard.notValid: is not a valid email address.
Dashboard.extraCurricularTitle: Extra Curricular activity drag and drop
Dashboard.skill-hint: Hint:- Enter skill name and press Comma or Enter
Dashboard.language-hint: Hint:- Enter language and press Comma or Enter
Dashboard.preference-hint: Hint:- Enter job preference and press Comma or Enter
Dashboard.aboutPublicationMessage: Write a few sentences about your publication with max 200 Characters.
Dashboard.aboutActivityMessage: Describe your extra curricular activity with max 300 characters.
Dashboard.aboutYourself: Write a few sentences about yourself with (min 200 Chars).

Request.name: Name
Request.description: Are you sure you want to delete this request? All of your data will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone.
Request.requestReceived: A request received from the requester.
Request.requestButtons: Click on the button to Approve or Deny.

Banner.message: Profile is incomplete, Please fill all the required fields

FormFAB.nameError: Name must contain at least 2 character(s) in Personal Section

OutgoingRequest.checkRequest: Check your request sent to the prospect.
OutgoingRequest.clickCard: Click on the card to visit prospect's resume.
OutgoingRequest.visitViaPasscode: If you wish to visit via passcode, here it is. Just enter your passcode when you are asked.
OutgoingRequest.visitViaClick: Click on the card to visit prospect's resume only if the status is Approved.

ReviewList.noReviews: No Reviews at the moment, Check back laterss.

Requests.acceptDescription: Accept the request to share your resume.
Requests.denyDescription: Deny request to stop sharing your resume.
Requests.receiveRequests: Receive Requests when someone clicks on your profile.
Requests.acceptRequest: When you receive a request, you can accept or deny the request When you accept the request you are sharing your resume details. You can also control the accessibility of your resume. Just by Clicking on the deny button you can stop sharing your resume information with the requester.

Prospects.mailDescription: Mail your prospect regardless of approval.
Prospects.acceptApproval: This feature gets enabled only on Approval of your request.
Prospects.viewApprovals: View your requested Resume on approval of your request
Prospects.checkApprovals: On approval of your request, view the resume of the requested ones. You can view their resume just by clicking on VIEW RESUME button. You can contact your propspect regardless of approval. You also get a passcode. You can use this passcode in order to view the resume. For example, visit on your requested profile. Click on View Resume button. Enter the shown passcode and you can view the resume.

Reviews.viewApprovals: View your requested Resume on approval of your request
Reviews.checkApprovals: On approval of your request, view the resume of the requested ones. You can view their resume just by clicking on VIEW RESUME button. You can contact your propspect regardless of approval. You also get a passcode. You can use this passcode in order to view the resume. For example, visit on your requested profile. Click on View Resume button. Enter the shown passcode and you can view the resume.

ResumeForm.educationDetails: Enter all your education details here.
ResumeForm.experienceDetails: Enter all your experience details here.
ResumeForm.awardsAndAchievements: Enter all your awards and achievements here.
ResumeForm.socialMedia: Enter your social media details here.
ResumeForm.causeDetails: Select causes you care about here.
ResumeForm.extraCurricularActivites: Enter details of your extracurricular activities.

Appbar.title: LeetCV
Appbar.quote: Checkout the resume. Click on the url to visit on the profile.
Appbar.signOutWarningOne: Signing out will prevent you from receiving push notifications on this device.
Appbar.signOutWarningTwo: Signing out will prevent you from notifying you of requests to view your resume.
